mapper.select: SELECT 'EST' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') || '-' || LPAD( NVL( (SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(EST_NO), 7)) + 1 FROM TB_CR01M01 WHERE SUBSTR(EST_NO, 4, 2) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY') AND CO_CD = #{coCd}), 1 ), 4, '0' ) AS max_est_no FROM DUAL

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT A.* , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.CO_CD , R.CODE_NM AS CO_NM , A.EST_NO , A.EST_DEG , TO_CHAR(A.PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PBLS_DT , A.EST_CLNT_CD , C.CLNT_NM AS EST_CLNT_NM , A.CLNT_PJT , FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(A.CLNT_PJT) AS CLNT_PJT_NM , TO_CHAR(A.EST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EST_DT , TO_CHAR(A.ESTS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESTS_DT , TO_CHAR(A.ESTE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ESTE_DT , A.CSTM_MNG_NM , A.CSTM_MNG_HP , A.MNG_ID , U3.NAME AS MNG_ID_NM , A.EST_NM , A.CURR_CD , R1.CODE_NM AS CURR_NM , NVL(A.EXRATE, 1) AS EXRATE , NVL(A.EST_AMT, 0) AS EST_AMT , NVL(A.EST_NEGO_AMT, 0) AS EST_NEGO_AMT , A.EST_EXCEPT , A.EST_STD , A.EST_DLVR_CNDT , A.EST_PMNT_CNDT , A.EST_DUDT , NVL(A.ORDRS_YN, 'N') AS ORDRS_YN , TO_CHAR(A.ORDRS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDRS_DT , A.EST_RMK , U1.NAME AS CREAT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREAT_DTTM , U2.NAME AS UDT_ID_NM , TO_CHAR(A.UDT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UDT_DTTM , A.CREAT_ID , A.UDT_ID , A.CREAT_PGM , A.UDT_PGM , A.ETC_FIELD1 , A.ETC_FIELD2 , A.ETC_FIELD3 FROM TB_CR01M01 AS A --고객사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_BM02M01 AS C ON C.CLNT_CD = A.EST_CLNT_CD --회사 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R ON R.CODE_ID = A.CO_CD --통화단위 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 AS R1 ON R1.CODE_ID = A.CURR_CD --생성자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U1 ON U1.ID = A.CREAT_ID --변경자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U2 ON U2.ID = A.UDT_ID --담당자 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 AS U3 ON U3.ID = A.MNG_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.CO_CD = #{coCd}
AND A.EST_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND C.CLNT_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY A.CO_CD, A.EST_NO, A.EST_DEG ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1 ) AS A WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT TO_CHAR(B.EST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EST_DT, TO_CHAR(B.PBLS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PBLS_DT, TO_CHAR(B.ORDRS_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDRS_DT, B.*, B.MAX_EST_DEG FROM (SELECT A.*, MAX(A.EST_DEG) OVER (PARTITION BY A.CO_CD, A.EST_NO) AS MAX_EST_DEG FROM TB_CR01M01 A) B WHERE B.CO_CD = #{coCd} AND B.EST_NO = #{estNo} AND B.EST_DEG = #{estDeg}
mapper.insert:
SELECT TO_CHAR(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(FILE_TRGT_KEY)), 0) + 1) FROM TB_CR01M01
INSERT INTO TB_CR01M01 ( CO_CD, EST_NO, EST_CLNT_CD, EST_DT, CSTM_MNG_NM, CSTM_MNG_HP, EST_NM, CURR_CD,EST_AMT, EST_EXCEPT, EST_DLVR_CNDT, EST_PMNT_CNDT, EST_DUDT, EST_DEG, FILE_TRGT_KEY, EXRATE, MNG_ID, EST_NEGO_AMT, EST_STD, ORDRS_YN, ESTS_DT,ESTE_DT,CLNT_PJT, PBLS_DT ,CREAT_ID,CREAT_PGM )
VALUES ( #{coCd}, #{estNo}, #{estClntCd}, #{estDt}, #{cstmMngNm}, #{cstmMngHp}, #{estNm}, #{currCd}, #{estAmt}, #{estExcept}, #{estDlvrCndt}, #{estPmntCndt}, #{estDudt}, #{estDeg}, #{fileTrgtKey}, #{exrate}, #{mngId}, #{estNegoAmt}, #{estStd} ,#{ordrsYn},#{estsDt},#{esteDt},#{clntPjt}, #{pblsDt}, #{creatId},#{creatPgm} )

INSERT INTO TB_CR01D01 ( CO_CD, EST_NO, EST_DTL_DIV, EST_SEQ, EST_COMM, EST_SPEC, EST_UNIT, EST_QTY, EST_UPR, EST_DEG , CREAT_ID , CREAT_PGM ) VALUES ( #{coCd}, #{estNo}, #{estDtlDiv}, #{estSeq}, #{estComm}, #{estSpec, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{estUnit}, #{estQty}, #{estUpr}, #{estDeg} , #{creatId}, #{creatPgm} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CR01M01 SET EST_CLNT_CD = #{estClntCd}, EST_DT = #{estDt, jdbcType=DATE}, CSTM_MNG_NM = #{cstmMngNm}, CSTM_MNG_HP = #{cstmMngHp}, EST_NM = #{estNm}, CURR_CD = #{currCd}, EST_AMT = #{estAmt}, EST_EXCEPT = #{estExcept}, EST_DLVR_CNDT = #{estDlvrCndt}, EST_PMNT_CNDT = #{estPmntCndt}, EST_DUDT = #{estDudt}, EXRATE = #{exrate}, MNG_ID = #{mngId}, EST_NEGO_AMT = #{estNegoAmt}, EST_STD = #{estStd}, ESTS_DT = #{estsDt}, ESTE_DT = #{esteDt}, CLNT_PJT = #{clntPjt}, PBLS_DT = #{pblsDt}, UDT_ID = #{udtId}, UDT_PGM = #{udtPgm}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND EST_NO = #{estNo} AND EST_DEG = #{estDeg}

UPDATE TB_CR01D01 SET EST_DTL_DIV = #{estDtlDiv}, EST_COMM = #{estComm}, EST_SPEC = #{estSpec, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EST_QTY = #{estQty}, EST_UPR = #{estUpr}, EST_RMK =#{estRmk}, EST_UNIT = #{estUnit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UDT_ID = #{udtId}, UDT_PGM = #{udtPgm}, UDT_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND EST_NO = #{estNo} AND EST_SEQ = #{estSeq} AND EST_DEG = #{estDeg}
